name: FISH 3D PREDATOR GROW FEEDING
description:
Hunt! Feeding! Chaos! Predator!

Become a great hunter with a great predator who could be a huge fish in the fantastic underwater world. You can choose from almost 40 fish.
Be the biggest predator that can eat everything. Become a bigger and bigger predator. Rule the underwater area and be the great predator king.

You can see the attacked fish fall to pieces and then you can eat them.

Watch your progress get bigger and meanwhile how you chew your food.

Swim faster and faster and pick up a lot of energy in the process.

Come test how big you are a surviving predator in the depths of the ocean.

How can you play the predator game:

- Choose the fish you want to be with
- Attack other fishes while pressing the bite button to get gold for it and get bigger and bigger
- Collect enough gold to make progress

Enjoy the game!
